Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near Grand/Fairbanks
ShortDescription: Westbound 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand,Fairbanks, Ontario and State: due to,street blockage near Grand/Fairbanks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63W West 63rd  buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand,Fairbanks, Ontario and Stateincluding the normal route streets at the beginning and end, due to street blockage near Grand/Fairbanks.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Grand/Fairbanks
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario and State: due to,street blockage near  Grand/Fairbank.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses buses are temporarily rerouted via  Grand, Fairbanks, Ontario and State including the normal route streets at the beginning and end, due to street blockage near  Grand/Fairbanks.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change between LaSalle and Grand
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays due to a sick customer at Monroe; board all trains on the Forest Park-bound sideof affected stations between LaSalle & Grand.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service is running with delays due to a sick customer at Monroe.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between LaSalle and Grand stations.

Board/exit all trains on the Forest Park-bound side of the platform of the affected stations of LaSalle, Jackson, Monroe, Washington, Clark/Division and Grand.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Waveland
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, via Kimball, Elston, Addison and Kimball due to street blockage near Kimball/Waveland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, via Kimball, Elston, Addison and Kimball due to street blockage near Kimball/Waveland.

Allow extra travel time.
